title: Mini-Ep 237: Nighttime is the Right Time
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 237: Nighttime is the Right Time
itunes:subtitle: Kate takes a disorienting two-hour nap on a weekend trip and Doree enjoys perfect weather in NYC. Then, they hear from listeners about the gift of being reminded to stand in your power, some bug bite self-care, and the unexpected joy of sleeping hard....
description:
Kate takes a disorienting two-hour nap on a weekend trip and Doree enjoys perfect weather in NYC. Then, they hear from listeners about the gift of being reminded to stand in your power, some bug bite self-care, and the unexpected joy of sleeping hard.


  • Please check out this list: 20 Organizations Fighting the Texas Abortion Ban.
